channel.title: Comments on: Butternut Squash Scallion Muffins (AIP/Paleo)

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/butternut-squash-scallion-muffins/#comment-467">Anne Berry</a>.
Thanks for sharing! Always great to know swaps that work.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Anne Berry.

Thanks for sharing! Always great to know swaps that work.

item.title: By: Anne Berry
item.dc:creator: Anne Berry
item.description: I just thought I would report that I made these with a mixture of 3 gluten free flours in place of the tigernut flour and it worked really well. They were delicious.
item.content:encoded: I just thought I would report that I made these with a mixture of 3 gluten free flours in place of the tigernut flour and it worked really well. They were delicious.

item.title: By: Veronica
item.dc:creator: Veronica
item.description: Perfect savory muffins! They have such a good texture and flavor. Thanks for the recipe.
item.content:encoded: Perfect savory muffins! They have such a good texture and flavor. Thanks for the recipe.

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/butternut-squash-scallion-muffins/#comment-349">Olga</a>.
I am so happy to hear you love the muffins and will keep them in your recipe rotation. Thank you for letting me know!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Olga.

I am so happy to hear you love the muffins and will keep them in your recipe rotation. Thank you for letting me know!

item.title: By: Olga
item.dc:creator: Olga
item.description: I made these today and we really loved them. Going to keep them in my rotation and try to keep on hand to go with soups or as a snack. Thank you so much - it's not easy to find a legit savoury muffin recipe!
item.content:encoded: I made these today and we really loved them. Going to keep them in my rotation and try to keep on hand to go with soups or as a snack. Thank you so much – it’s not easy to find a legit savoury muffin recipe!

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/butternut-squash-scallion-muffins/#comment-344">Teri</a>.
Thank you for the review! I am so happy you enjoyed the recipe.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Teri.

Thank you for the review! I am so happy you enjoyed the recipe.

item.title: By: Teri
item.dc:creator: Teri
item.description: Delicious! I was tempted to add a tad sweetener but so happy I didn't. I have introduced eggs so I used 1 egg instead of gelatin. Our grocery store sells butternut squash cut into cubes so I just threw those on a baking sheet and oven baked them first. Maybe that "sweetened" the muffins. I love the dry ingredient mix as the muffins were soft and yummy. I'm thinking of trying your dry flour mix for banana muffins. Mashed bananas (instead of squash) and add cinnamon and allspice. This is the first bread/muffin recipe that actually looks and tastes like muffins. Thanks for the recipe.
item.content:encoded: Delicious! I was tempted to add a tad sweetener but so happy I didn’t. I have introduced eggs so I used 1 egg instead of gelatin. Our grocery store sells butternut squash cut into cubes so I just threw those on a baking sheet and oven baked them first. Maybe that “sweetened” the muffins. I love the dry ingredient mix as the muffins were soft and yummy. I’m thinking of trying your dry flour mix for banana muffins. Mashed bananas (instead of squash) and add cinnamon and allspice. This is the first bread/muffin recipe that actually looks and tastes like muffins. Thanks for the recipe.

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/butternut-squash-scallion-muffins/#comment-339">Andrea</a>.
Thank you! I hope you enjoy the muffins and they really are a perfect breakfast. I would love to hear how the muffins work for you!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Andrea.

Thank you! I hope you enjoy the muffins and they really are a perfect breakfast. I would love to hear how the muffins work for you!

item.title: By: Andrea
item.dc:creator: Andrea
item.description: Yum! These sound delicious! I love a good savory muffin! They sound perfect for prepping on a weekend and eating with breakfast all week. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: Yum! These sound delicious! I love a good savory muffin! They sound perfect for prepping on a weekend and eating with breakfast all week. Thanks!
